milestones.title: Continued Excellence
milestones.description: Building on our strong foundation, we continue to grow and excel in competitive programming with new initiatives and expanded training programs.

milestones.title: Record Breaking Year
milestones.description: Our most successful year yet, with multiple teams qualifying for ECPC and ACPC, setting new standards for USC competitive programming.

milestones.title: Major Breakthrough
milestones.description: A pivotal year where we established ourselves as a serious competitive programming community with structured training and significant achievements.

milestones.title: Growth & Organization
milestones.description: Rapid expansion of the community with organized training sessions and the beginning of our competitive journey.

milestones.title: Foundation Years
milestones.description: The beginning of our journey. A small group of passionate students came together to form what would become the USC competitive programming community.

achievements.title: ECPC Qualifications
achievements.description: Total teams that qualified for Egyptian Collegiate Programming Contest

achievements.title: ACPC Participation
achievements.description: Teams that represented Egypt at Arab Collegiate Programming Contest

achievements.title: Expert+ Members
achievements.description: Members who achieved Expert level rating or higher

achievements.title: Training Hours
achievements.description: Total hours of structured competitive programming training
